newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Feb tin imports up 3.1 pct year/year--MOF.
newsitem.headline: Japan Feb tin imports up 3.1 pct year/year--MOF.

text.p: Japan imported 2,274 tonnes of refined tin in February, up 3.1 percent from 2,267 tonnes in the same month last year, Finance Ministry data said on Friday.
The imports (on a customs-cleared basis in tonnes) were as follows:
Cumulative imports in the first two months of 1997 were 4,441 tonnes, slightly up from 4,359 tonnes in the same period a year earlier.
